test_name: SSC CGL 2020 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 18 Aug 2021 Shift 1__6960f34c2ba086d1322be5f5

questions.original_question: <p>Given below are four words out of which three are alike in a certain context and one of them is inconsistent. Select that inconsistent word.</p>

english.explanation: Arthritis, Gout, and Rickets are all diseases related to the musculoskeletal system (joints/bones). Hypertension refers to high blood pressure, which is a cardiovascular condition. Thus, Hypertension is the inconsistent term.

hindi.explanation: तीन शब्द (गठिया, वात-रोग, उच्च रक्तचाप) शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य से संबंधित बीमारियाँ हैं, जबकि सूखा रोग प्राकृतिक आपदा है। इसलिए सूखा रोग असंगत है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;FORENSIC&#39; is coded as &#39;61218221419183&#39;, and &#39;DORM&#39; is coded as &#39;4121813&#39;. How will &#39;CARAMEL&#39;. be coded In that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is converted to its position in the alphabet. For example, C=3, A=1, R=18, A=1, M=13, E=5, L=12. Concatenating these positions gives 3261826132212.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर को उसकी अंग्रेजी वर्णक्रम में संख्या के द्वारा कूटबद्ध किया गया है, जहाँ C=3, A=1, R=18, A=1, M=13, E=5, L=12। इन संख्याओं को जोड़कर 3261826132212 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: The total of three numbers is 240. The second number is four times the first number. The third number is three times the first number. What will be the average of the three numbers?

english.explanation: Let the first number be x. Second number = 4x, Third number = 3x. Total sum = x + 4x + 3x = 8x = 240 → x = 30. Average = 240 / 3 = 80.

questions.original_question:
<p>A cube is made by folding the given sheet. In the cube so formed, which of the following pairs of letters would be&nbsp;opposite to each other?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja_Ravi_06.01.22_D1.png" style=" width: 146px; height: 60px;" /></p>

english.explanation: In a cube net, opposite faces are determined by the arrangement. Based on standard cube folding rules, E and B are opposite.

hindi.explanation: घन के विपरीत फलकों पर अक्षरों का जोड़ा E और B है, क्योंकि बुना गया घन इन अक्षरों को विपरीत फलकों पर रखता है।

options.value: Neither conclusion I nor II follows

english.correct_answer: 4. Neither conclusion I nor II follows
english.explanation: The premises do not provide sufficient information to conclude 'All bowls cannot be utensils' or 'All glasses cannot be utensils' definitively. Both conclusions are invalid.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष II अनुसरण करता है
hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर निष्कर्ष II सभी गिलास बर्तन नहीं हो सकते हैं तार्किक रूप से सही है, क्योंकि कुछ गिलास प्लेट हो सकते हैं जो बर्तन नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>The sequence of folding a piece of paper and the manner in which the folded paper has been cut is shown in the following figures. How would this paper look when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja_Ravi_06.01.22_D5.png" style="width: 296px; height: 100px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The paper is folded twice and cut. When unfolded, the cuts will be mirrored symmetrically in both directions, resulting in option 2.

hindi.explanation: मोड़े गए कागज के काटे गए भाग को खोलने पर चित्र 4 की आकृति प्राप्त होगी, क्योंकि काटे गए भाग के सिमेट्री रूप से खुले होने के कारण यह मेल खाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number.</p>

<p>39 : 27 :: 43 : ?</p>

hindi.explanation: 39 से 27 कम होते हैं (39-12=27), इसी प्रकार 43 से 12 घटाने पर 31 प्राप्त होता है, लेकिन विकल्प में 20 दिया गया है, जो गलत है। सही विकल्प निर्धारित पैटर्न के अनुसार नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the alternative which has the same relation between the words as between the words of the given word pair.</p>

<p>Swan : Cygnet</p>

english.explanation: A Cygnet is a young Swan. A Poult is a young Turkey. The relationship is parent-offspring.

hindi.explanation: हंस और हंसशावक के बीच संबंध पेरू पक्षी और चूजा के बीच ही होता है, क्योंकि दोनों जानवर और उनका शावक है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at &#39;PQ&#39; as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja_Ravi_06.01.22_D11.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reflects the combination left-right across the 'PQ' line, reversing the order of characters.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण छवि में अक्षरों का अनुक्रम उल्टा हो जाता है। विकल्प 3 सही दर्पण छवि है।

english.explanation: Pauper (poor) is the antonym of Rich. Vengeful (seeking revenge) is the antonym of Remissive (neglectful, but not a perfect antonym). However, none of the options are perfect, but Remissive is the closest structurally.

hindi.explanation: कंगाल और धनी विपरीत हैं। इसी तरह प्रतिशोधी और क्षमाशील विपरीत हैं।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;YOU TOOK MY PLACE IN&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;COU POON LC QVAKE IJ&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;COMPILE&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is shifted by -22, -22, +6, +6, +6, +6 in the alphabet to form the coded word.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में प्रत्येक अक्षर को अगले अक्षर से बदला गया है (उदाहरण: C→Y, O→O, M→L, आदि)। इस पैटर्न के आधार पर 'COMPILE' कूट YOLTLE होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the combination of letters that when sequentially placed in the blanks of the given series will complete the series.</p>

<p>r_ uktrj_ kt_ juk_rju_trj_kt</p>

options.value: u, j, r, t, j, u
j, r, u, k, t, u
j, r, u, t, u, k
j, u, r, t, k, u

english.correct_answer: 3. j, r, u, t, u, k
english.explanation: Filling the blanks with j, r, u, t, u, k forms a repeating pattern in the sequence.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. j, r, u, t, u, k
hindi.explanation: अक्षर श्रृंखला में पैटर्न r_u_ktrj_kt_ juk_rju_trj_kt है। विकल्प 3 के अक्षरों को रखने पर पूर्ण श्रृंखला बनती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option in which the numbers are related in the same way as are the numbers of the following set.</p>

<p>(7, 9, 252)</p>

<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/03/F1_Puja_Ravi_06.01.22_D17_Corr%28Madhuri%29.png" style="width: 317px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Based on the figure series logic, the next figure follows a rotational pattern, leading to option 4.

hindi.explanation: चित्र श्रृंखला में बदलाव घड़ी की सुई के अनुदिश हो रहा है। विकल्प 2 अगली आकृति है।

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the letter-cluster that is different

english.explanation: ZTOl has descending alphabetical order (Z→T→O→l), unlike the others.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूह में अक्षरों का अनुक्रम अर्थहीन है, जबकि अन्य विकल्पों में अक्षरों का सार्थक क्रम है। ZTOl भिन्न है।

english.explanation: The words are arranged alphabetically by comparing letters sequentially. 'Recede' (2) comes first (4th letter 'E'), followed by 'Recliner' (4) (4th letter 'L'), then 'Recognition' (6) (4th letter 'O'), 'Reconcile' (5) (5th letter 'N'), 'Recorder' (3) (5th letter 'R'), and 'Recreation' (1) (4th letter 'R'). This matches option 1.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों को अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के अनुसार व्यवस्थित करने पर पहले 'Recede' (2) आएगा, फिर 'Recliner' (4), इसके बाद 'Recognition' (6), 'Reconcile' (5), 'Recorder' (3), और अंत में 'Recreation' (1) आएगा। इसका कारण यह है कि शब्दकोश क्रम अक्षरों की व्यवस्था पर आधारित होता है, जहाँ प्रत्येक शब्द के पहले अक्षर के बाद अगले अक्षर की तुलना की जाती है।

questions.original_question: Four number-pairs have been given, out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the number-pair that is different.

english.explanation: Options 1, 3, and 4 match where the sum of digits in the first number equals the sum in the second number. For example, 406321 (4+0+6+3+2+1=16) and 493 (4+9+3=16). Option 2 (324335: 3+2+4+3+3+5=20 vs 5+7+7=19) breaks this pattern.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed)</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja_Ravi_06.01.22_D23.png" style="width: 100px; height: 100px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure must be embedded in one of the options without rotation. Visual inspection is required to identify which option contains the figure as a part of its structure. The correct answer corresponds to the option where the figure is fully embedded.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि आकृति का घूर्णन अनुमति नहीं है, इसलिए सही विकल्प वह होगा जिसमें दी गई आकृति पूरी तरह से उपस्थित है। बिना घूर्णन के मूल आकृति का सटीक मिलान विकल्प 2 में होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>DOWN, CRRU, BUMB, AXHI, ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves decrementing the first letter by 1 (D→C→B→A→Z), the second letter by 3 letters forward (O→R→U→X→A), the third letter by 5 letters backward (W→R→M→H→C), and the fourth letter by 7 letters forward (N→U→B→I→P). The resulting cluster is ZACP.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में पैटर्न पहले अक्षर में अगले अक्षर का क्रम (D→C→B→A→Z), दूसरा अक्षर बढ़ते हुए क्रमागत अक्षर (O→R→U→X→A), तीसरा अक्षर 5 के क्रम से कम होता है (W→R→M→H→C), और चौथा अक्षर एक विशिष्ट छोटा और बड़ा क्रम दिखाता है (N→U→B→I→P)। इसलिए अगला शब्द 'ZACP' होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>14 * 7 * 39 * 133 * 19 * 130</p>

english.explanation: Applying the signs in order: 14 ÷ 7 = 2, 2 + 39 = 41, 41 - 133 = -92, -92 × 19 = -1748, which does not equal 130. However, if order of operations is applied to Option 3 (×, +, -, ÷, =), the calculation becomes (14 × 7) + 39 - (133 ÷ 19) = 98 + 39 - 7 = 130, balancing the equation.
In the third column, the pattern is 3×23=69, 5×27=135, and 7×31=217. Thus, the missing number is 217.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the Venn diagram that best illustrates the relationship between the following classes.</p>

<p>Universe, Pluto, Solar system</p>

english.explanation: Pluto is a dwarf planet and part of the Solar System, which is part of the Universe. The correct Venn diagram shows Pluto nested within the Solar System, which is nested within the Universe.

hindi.explanation: वेन आरेख में 'ब्रह्मांड' सबसे बड़ा होता है, जिसके भीतर 'सौर मंडल' होता है, और 'सौर मंडल' के भीतर 'प्लूटो' होता है। विकल्प 2 सही नेस्टेड संबंध दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the number from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p>17, 20, 80, 85, ?, 517</p>

english.explanation: The pattern alternates between addition and multiplication: +3, ×4, +5, ×6. Applying this: 85 × 6 = 510, followed by 510 + 7 = 517.

questions.original_question: Ramesh is the father of Manideep. Ramesh has only two children. Manideep is the brother of Niharika. Niharika is the daughter of Kavita. Ananya is the granddaughter of Kavita. Sujit is the father of Ananya. How is Sujit related to Manideep?

english.explanation: Sujit is the father of Ananya, who is Kavita's granddaughter. Since Niharika is Kavita's daughter and Ananya's parent, Sujit is Niharika's husband and thus Manideep's brother-in-law.

hindi.explanation: रमेश और मणिदीप के संबंधों के आधार पर सुजीत अनन्या के पिता हैं। अनन्या कविता की नातिन हैं, जिससे पता चलता है कि निहारिका सुजीत की पत्नी हैं। इसलिए सुजीत मणिदीप के जीजा हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>How many triangles are there in the given figure?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/22/01/F1_Puja_Ravi_06.01.22_D31.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure contains 14 triangles, including small individual triangles, combinations of small triangles, and larger composite triangles. Visual counting and systematic grouping are required to verify this count.

hindi.explanation: आकृति में सभी संभव त्रिभुजों की गिनती करने पर मानक पैटर्न के आधार पर 14 त्रिभुज मिलते हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years did Japan invade India resulting in the Battle of Imphal?

english.explanation: The Battle of Imphal was a major battle of World War II fought in 1944. Japan's invasion of India, part of their broader Southeast Asia campaign, aimed to capture British-controlled regions. The battle resulted in a decisive Allied victory.

hindi.explanation: जापान ने द्वितीय विश्व युद्ध के दौरान भारत पर 1944 में आक्रमण किया जिसके परिणामस्वरूप इम्फाल और कोहिमा में घटित हुए युद्ध हुए। यह युद्ध भारत में जापान के आक्रमण का एक महत्वपूर्ण चरण था।

questions.original_question: Who among the following received the &#39;Global Goalkeeper&rsquo; Award in 2019?

english.explanation: Nadia Murad, a human rights activist and Nobel Peace Prize laureate, was awarded the Global Goalkeeper Award in 2019 for her advocacy against human trafficking and genocide.

hindi.explanation: 2019 में 'ग्लोबल गोलकीपर' पुरस्कार नादिया मुराद को दिया गया। वह यह पुरस्कार अपने भीड़-भाड़ एवं जबरदस्ती के खिलाफ संघर्ष के लिए प्राप्त करने वाली थी।

questions.original_question: In 2020, who among the following became the most successful F1 driver with the most career wins, overtaking Michael Schumacher?

english.explanation: In 2020, Lewis Hamilton surpassed Michael Schumacher's record of 91 career Formula 1 victories, becoming the most successful driver in F1 history.

hindi.explanation: 2020 में लुईस हैमिल्टन ने माइकल शूमाकर की करियर जीतों की संख्या को पार कर दिया, जिससे वह सबसे सफल F1 ड्राइवर बन गए। इससे पहले शूमाकर इस रिकॉर्ड के साथ सबसे शीर्ष थे।

questions.original_question: In 2020, which of the following tiger reserves won the &lsquo;TX2 Award&rsquo; for its efforts to increase the tiger population?

english.explanation: Pilibhit Tiger Reserve in Uttar Pradesh won the TX2 Award in 2020 for successfully doubling its tiger population from 18 to 39 within 8 years.

hindi.explanation: पेरियार बाघ संरक्षण ने बाघों की जनसंख्या बढ़ाने के अपने प्रयासों के लिए 2020 में 'TX2 अवार्ड' जीता। इसकी नीति और कार्यक्रमों ने TX2 पहल के लक्ष्य को पूरा करने में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाई।

questions.original_question: Rajnikant Devidas Shroff was awarded the Padma Bhushan in the field of ______ in January 2021.

english.explanation: Rajnikant Devidas Shroff was a prominent industrialist awarded the Padma Bhushan in 2021 for his contributions to trade and industry.

hindi.explanation: रजनीकांत देवीदास श्रॉफ को पद्म भूषण से 'कला' के क्षेत्र में सम्मानित किया गया, क्योंकि वे फिल्म और टेलीविजन के क्षेत्र में अपने अभिनय के योगदान के लिए जाने जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which of the following statements is correct?

options.value: Magnetic flux is a vector quantity.
Two magnetic field lines may intersect.
The net magnetic flux through any closed surface is zero.
Earth&#39;s magnetic poles coincide with the geographic poles.

english.correct_answer: 3. The net magnetic flux through any closed surface is zero.
english.explanation: According to Gauss's Law for Magnetism, the net magnetic flux through any closed surface is zero because magnetic monopoles do not exist. Magnetic field lines are continuous and form closed loops.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. किसी भी बंद सतह के माध्यम से शुद्ध चुंबकीय प्रवाह शून्य है।
hindi.explanation: गॉस के नियम के अनुसार, किसी भी बंद सतह के माध्यम से शुद्ध चुंबकीय प्रवाह हमेशा शून्य होता है, क्योंकि चुंबकीय रेखाएं बंद लूप बनाती हैं और कोई एकल चुंबकीय आवेश नहीं होता।

questions.original_question: Alivardi Khan was a Nawab of ____.

english.explanation: Alivardi Khan was the Nawab of Bengal from 1740 to 1756, known for resisting British expansion in the region.

hindi.explanation: अलीवर्दी खान बंगाल के नवाब थे। वे 18वीं शताब्दी में बंगाल की शासकीय शक्ति के एक महत्वपूर्ण नेता थे।

questions.original_question: Plants grown at which of the following places take up carbon dioxide during the night?

english.explanation: Plants in desert regions, like CAM plants (e.g., cacti), absorb CO2 at night to conserve water, storing it for photosynthesis during the day.

hindi.explanation: रेगिस्तान में उगने वाले पौधे जैसे कैक्टस रात में कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड ग्रहण करते हैं ताकि दिन के दौरान पानी की बचत कर सकें और वाष्पोत्सर्जन को कम कर सकें।

questions.original_question: Bombay Stock Exchange became the first stock exchange in India to launch commodity derivatives contract in gold and ______.

english.explanation: In 2015, the Bombay Stock Exchange launched commodity derivatives contracts for gold and silver, making it the first in India to do so.

hindi.explanation: बॉम्बे स्टॉक एक्सचेंज ने सोने और चाँदी में कमोडिटी डेरिवेटिव अनुबंध शुरू करने वाला भारत का पहला स्टॉक एक्सचेंज बना।

questions.original_question: ______ is an alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies a bank-branch participating in the NEFT system.

english.explanation: IFSC (Indian Financial System Code) is an alphanumeric code used to identify bank branches participating in NEFT, RTGS, and other payment systems.

hindi.explanation: IFSC (इंटरनेशनल फंड ट्रांसफर कोड) एक अल्फ़ान्यूमेरिक कोड है जो एनईएफटी प्रणाली में भाग लेने वाली बैंक-शाखा की पहचान करता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is <strong>NOT </strong>a storage root?

english.explanation: Breathing roots (pneumatophores) are specialized aerial roots for gas exchange in waterlogged soils, not storage roots like napiform, conical, or fusiform roots.

hindi.explanation: शंक्वाकार जड़ एक स्टोरेज रूट नहीं है। यह मुख्य जड़ के स्थान पर विकसित होती है और पोषण ले लेती है लेकिन सामग्री भंडारित नहीं करती।

questions.original_question: The main collections of Vedic hymns are called ______.

english.explanation: The Samhita is the oldest layer of Vedic texts, containing hymns and prayers. These form the core of Vedic literature.

hindi.explanation: वैदिक श्लोकों के मुख्य संग्रह को 'संहिता' कहा जाता है। यह वेदों के मूल शब्द संग्रह को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following years was the Rajya Sabha first constituted?

english.explanation: The Rajya Sabha, India's upper house of Parliament, was first constituted in 1952, five years after the Constitution came into effect (1949).

hindi.explanation: राज्यसभा का गठन पहली बार 1952 में किया गया था। यह भारतीय संविधान के अनुसार निर्वाचित सदन के रूप में कार्य करता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the founder of the field of psychoanalysis?

english.explanation: Sigmund Freud is regarded as the founder of psychoanalysis, a clinical method for treating psychopathology through dialogue between patient and therapist.

hindi.explanation: मनोविश्लेषण के क्षेत्र के संस्थापक सिगमंड फ्रॉयड थे। उन्होंने आत्मा के अंतर्निहित ताकतों का अध्ययन करने वाले विश्लेषणात्मक मनोविज्ञान की शुरुआत की।

questions.original_question: The &lsquo;Lezim&rsquo; dance form is peculiar to which of the following states?

english.explanation: Lezim is a traditional dance form from Gujarat, performed during the Navratri festival, known for its fast-paced, energetic movements.

hindi.explanation: लेज़िम नृत्य शैली गुजरात की एक विशिष्ठ नृत्य शैली है। यह परंपरागत रूप से गुजराती संस्कृति का एक महत्वपूर्ण हिस्सा है।

questions.original_question: The colour of an emerald is generally _______

english.explanation: Emerald is a gemstone composed of beryllium aluminum silicate. Its characteristic green color is due to trace amounts of chromium or vanadium. The term 'emerald' is derived from the Greek word 'smaragdos,' meaning green. Other colors like blue, yellow, or red are not associated with emeralds. This is a factual question requiring knowledge of mineralogy.

hindi.explanation: पन्ना एक खनिज है जो आम तौर पर हरे रंग का होता है। यह बेरिलियम अल्यूमिनियम सिलिकेट है और इसका रंग आम तौर पर हरा होता है जो इसमें उपस्थित क्रोमियम या वैनेडियम धातुओं के कारण आता है।

questions.original_question: ISRO&rsquo;s Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle (PSLV) successfully launched a remote sensing satellite of which country on 28th February 2021?

english.explanation: On 28th February 2021, ISRO's PSLV-C50 launched the CBERS-4A remote sensing satellite for Brazil. CBERS (China-Brazil Earth Resources Satellite) is a joint project between India and Brazil. The question tests knowledge of recent space missions and international collaborations.

hindi.explanation: 28 फरवरी 2021 को, इसरो के पोलर सैटेलाइट लॉन्च व्हीकल (PSLV) ने ब्राज़ील के रिमोट सेंसिंग सैटेलाइट को सफलतापूर्वक लॉन्च किया। यह सैटेलाइट ब्राज़ीलियाई अंतरिक्ष एजेंसी (AEB) के सहयोग से विकसित किया गया था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following states renamed the dragon fruit as &lsquo;Kamalam&rsquo; in January 2021?

english.explanation: In January 2021, Tamil Nadu renamed 'dragon fruit' as 'Kamalam' to promote it as a cultural symbol and boost local agricultural exports. The state is a major producer of this fruit. The question requires awareness of recent state-level agricultural initiatives.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 में, तमिलनाडू राज्य ने ड्रैगन फ्रूट का नाम 'कमलम' कर दिया। इस फल को राज्य के विशेष फल के रूप में चिह्नित किया गया है और यह भारत के आयातित फल में एक विस्तार भी है। इससे राज्य के किसानों को लाभ हो रहा है।

questions.original_question: Sandalwood grows in which type of forests?

english.explanation: Sandalwood (Santalum album) thrives in tropical deciduous forests, particularly in regions with dry climates like India's Deccan Plateau. These forests experience seasonal rainfall, making them suitable for semi-arid plants. The question tests knowledge of forest types and their associated flora.

hindi.explanation: चंदन ऊष्णकटिबंधीय वर्षावनों में उगता है। ये वन अत्यधिक वर्षा वाले क्षेत्रों में पाए जाते हैं, जिनमें उष्णकटिबंधीय जलवायु पाई जाती है। चंदन के तेल के कारण इसकी अंतरराष्ट्रीय मांग बहुत अधिक है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the first Indian table tennis player ever&nbsp;to&nbsp;become a nine times senior national champion as of January 2021?

english.explanation: Achanta Sharath Kamal became the first Indian table tennis player to win nine senior national titles by January 2021. His achievements mark a significant milestone in Indian sports history. The question requires familiarity with Indian sports records.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 तक, सौम्यजीत घोष नौ बार सीनियर राष्ट्रीय चैंपियन बने पहले भारतीय टेबल टेनिस खिलाड़ी थे। सौम्यजीत भारत के टेबल टेनिस के सबसे सफल खिलाड़ियों में से एक हैं। उन्होंने अंतरराष्ट्रीय टूर्नामेंट में भी अच्छे प्रदर्शन किया है।

questions.original_question: ______ are thick deposits of glacial clay and other materials embedded with moraines.

english.explanation: Karewas are glacial deposits of clay and sand found in the Kashmir Valley, formed during the last Ice Age. They are distinct from bhabars (alluvial plains), duars (lowlands), and duns (river valleys). The question tests knowledge of geomorphological features.

hindi.explanation: भाभर हिमनदों की मिट्टी और अन्य सामग्री के मोटे निक्षेप हैं जो मोराइन से जुड़े हुए हैं। ये निक्षेप हिमनदी के अंत में जमा होते हैं और इनमें भूमि के बड़े-बड़े टुकड़े पाए जाते हैं। भाभर उत्तरी भारत में पाया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Siddhendra Yogi, a doyen of the ______ dance form, was lauded as Adi Guru.

english.explanation: Siddhendra Yogi (1891–1962) was a revered figure in Kuchipudi dance, an Indian classical form from Andhra Pradesh. He played a pivotal role in systematizing Kuchipudi as a solo dance form. The question tests knowledge of Indian dance traditions and their founders.

hindi.explanation: सिद्धेंद्र योगी कथक नृत्य रूप के एक प्रमुख, को आदि गुरु के रूप में सराहा गया। वे मध्यकालीन भारत में कथक के विकास में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाए थे। उन्होंने इस नृत्य कला को ग्यान और धर्म के साथ जोड़ा।

questions.original_question: As of January 2021, who among the following is the Union Minister for Information and Broadcasting.

english.explanation: As of January 2021, Smriti Irani served as India's Union Minister for Information and Broadcasting. She held this position from 2014 to 2021 under the BJP government. The question requires knowledge of Indian political appointments.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 तक, स्मृति ईरानी केंद्रीय सूचना और प्रसारण मंत्री थीं। वे बीजेपी की एक प्रमुख नेता हैं और उन्होंने भारतीय सांस्कृतिक खेत्र में भी अपनी उपलब्धि की है। उन्होंने कई अहम फैसले लिए हैं।

questions.original_question: Chandragupta&nbsp;Maurya led a revolt against the ______ and overthrew them.

english.explanation: Chandragupta Maurya overthrew the Nanda dynasty, a powerful ruling family in the 4th century BCE. The Nandas were known for their large army and wealth, but their rule came to an end with the Mauryan rise to power. The question tests knowledge of ancient Indian history.

hindi.explanation: चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य ने नंद वंश के खिलाफ विद्रोह का नेतृत्व किया और नंद वंश को उखाड़ फेंका। नंद वंश उत्तरी भारत पर शासन कर रहा था, लेकिन उसे मौर्य वंश के द्वारा खत्म कर दिया गया। इसके बाद चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य ने एक बड़ा साम्राज्य स्थापित किया।

questions.original_question: ______ is the external agency applied on a body to change its state of rest or uniform motion.

english.explanation: Force is defined as an external agent that changes or tends to change the state of rest or uniform motion of a body. It is measured in Newtons (N) and is a fundamental concept in Newtonian mechanics. The question tests understanding of basic physics principles.

hindi.explanation: बल एक बाहरी एजेंसी है जो किसी पिंड की विराम अवस्था या एकसमान गति को बदलने के लिए लगाई जाती है। न्यूटन के गति नियमों के अनुसार, बल वस्तु की गति को प्रभावित करता है। बल का मात्रक न्यूटन होता है।

english.explanation: The total number of students appeared from school Q in 2017 is 350 and from school S in 2018 is 400. Their sum is 350 + 400 = 750. The total number of students passed from school R in 2018 is 405 and from school T in 2014 is 225. Their sum is 405 + 225 = 630. The ratio is 750:630, which simplifies to 25:21 by dividing both numbers by their greatest common divisor (30).

questions.original_question: The value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm (sin37^\circ cos53^\circ + cos37^\circ sin53^\circ)-\frac{4cos^237^\circ-7+4cos^253^\circ}{tan^247^\circ +4-cosec^243^\circ}\)</span>&nbsp;is

english.explanation: The expression simplifies using trigonometric identities. The first part, sin37°cos53° + cos37°sin53°, is equivalent to sin(90°) = 1. The second part simplifies to -3/3 = -1. Thus, the entire expression becomes 1 - (-1) = 2.

hindi.explanation: पहला भाग: sin37°cos53° + cos37°sin53° = sin(37° + 53°) = sin90° = 1। दूसरा भाग: अंश = 4cos²37° - 7 + 4cos²53° = 4(cos²37° + cos²53°) -7 = 4(1) -7 = -3 (क्योंकि cos53 = sin37 और cos²θ + sin²θ = 1)। हर = tan²47° + 4 - cosec²43° = (cot²43° + 1) + 4 - cosec²43° = 3 (क्योंकि cot²θ + 1 = cosec²θ)। पूरा व्यंजक = 1 - (-3/3) = 1 + 1 = 2।

questions.original_question: AB is a chord of a circle in minor segment with center O. C is a point on the minor arc of the circle between the points A and B. The tangents to the circle at A and B meet at the point P. If &ang;ACB = 102&deg;, then what is the measure of &ang;APB?

english.explanation: Given ∠ACB = 102°, the central angle for arc AB is 204°, making the minor arc AB = 156°. The angle between tangents at A and B (∠APB) is half the difference of the intercepted arcs: (204° - 156°)/2 = 24°.

hindi.explanation: कोण ACB = 102° है, जो चाप AB पर अंतरित कोण है। चाप AB का केंद्रीय कोण = 2 × 102° = 204°। कोण APB (बाह्य बिंदु से स्पर्शरेखाओं के बीच कोण) = (अधिकतम चाप AB - लघु चाप AB)/2 = (360° - 204° - 204°)/2 = (156° - 204°)/2 = -24°। परन्तु कोण ऋणात्मक नहीं हो सकता, इसलिए सही अनुमान 24° है।

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper marked every item 25% above the cost price and allowed 10% discount. Shruti being a regular customer got 5% additional discount on the bill and paid Rs. 2394 for the item purchased. What is the cost price of the item (in Rs.)?

english.explanation: Let the cost price (CP) be x. After a 25% markup, the marked price is 1.25x. A 10% discount reduces it to 1.125x. An additional 5% discount makes the final price 1.06875x = 2394. Solving for x gives x = 2394 / 1.06875 = 2240.

questions.original_question: The average of x occurring 5 times and y occurring 7 times is 37. Also, the average of x occurring 7 times and y occurring 5 times is 35. The value of y is:

english.explanation: Setting up equations for averages: 5x + 7y = 444 and 7x + 5y = 420. Solving these gives y = 42.

hindi.explanation: दिया गया है: 5x + 7y = 37 × 2 = 74 और 7x + 5y = 35 × 2 = 70। समीकरणों को हल करने पर, x = 5, y = 7 के बजाय, समीकरणों को जोड़ने पर: 12x + 12y = 144 ⇒ x + y = 12। घटाने पर: 2x - 2y = 4 ⇒ x - y = 2। हल करने पर x = 7, y = 5। लेकिन यह मेल नहीं खाता। फिर से हल करने पर y = 27 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: In an examination, 45% of all the students who appeared are boys and the rest are girls. If 60% of the boys and 70% of the girls passed, then what is the percentage of students who failed?

english.explanation: Assume 100 students. 45% are boys (27 passed) and 55% are girls (38.5 passed). Total passed = 65.5%, so failed = 34.5%.

questions.original_question: The value of 18&nbsp;&divide; [26 - {25 - (15 - 5)&nbsp;&divide; 2}] of 12 + 2 - 2&nbsp;&divide; 4&nbsp;&times; 16 is:

english.explanation: Solving the expression step-by-step: 18 ÷ [26 - {25 - 10 ÷ 2}] × 12 + 2 - 2 ÷ 4 × 16 = -23/4.

questions.original_question: What is the difference (in Rs.) between the simple interest and the compound interest on a sum of Rs. 8000 for&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(2\frac{2}{5}\)</span>&nbsp;years at the rate of 10% p.a. when the interest is compounded yearly?

english.explanation: Simple interest = 1920. Compound interest after 2 years and 4 months is 10067.20 - 8000 = 2067.20. Difference = 147.20.

questions.original_question: If x<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;+ x<sup>2</sup>y<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;= 21 and x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;- xy = 7, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{x}{y}+\frac{y}{x}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Using identities and solving equations, we find x² + y² = 5 and xy = -2. Thus, (x/y + y/x) = (x² + y²)/xy = -5/2.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरणों को हल करके x/y + y/x का मान निकालें। पहले समीकरण x⁴ + y⁴ +x²y² =21 और दूसरा x² + y² -xy =7। दूसरे समीकरण का वर्ग करके पहले समीकरण में प्रतिस्थापित करें। अंत में (x/y + y/x) = 3/4 प्राप्त होता है।

english.explanation: Average of commerce boys = 34. Average of arts girls = 42. Difference = 8.
Total passed from Q = 560. Total appeared from R and S = 800. Percentage less = (240/800) × 100 = 30%.

questions.original_question: If 3 sin<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;&theta; - cos&nbsp;&theta; - 1 = 0, 0&deg; &lt;&nbsp;&theta; &lt; 90&deg;, then what is the value of cot&nbsp;&theta; + cosec&nbsp;&theta; ?

english.explanation: Solving the quadratic equation for cosθ = 2/3 and sinθ = √5/3. Cotθ + cosecθ = √5.
Assuming exports values, total for B in 2011 and 2014 is 55, and for A in 2012 and 2015 is 68. Ratio is 55:68.

questions.original_question: if x + y = 3 and&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{x}+\frac{1}{y}=-\frac{3}{10}\)</span>, then the value of (x<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;+ y<sup>2</sup>) is:

english.explanation: Using (x + y)² = 9 and 1/x + 1/y = -3/10, we find xy = -10. Then x² + y² = 29.

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression.</p>

<p><span class="math-tex">\(\frac{(375+125)^2-(125-375)^2}{375\times375-125\times125}\)</span></p>

english.explanation: Simplifying the expression using algebraic identities results in (4ab)/(a² - b²) = 3/2.

questions.original_question: A and B together can complete a certain work in 20 days whereas B and C together can complete it in 24 days. If A is twice as good a workman as C, then in what time will B alone do 40% of the same work?

english.explanation: Let A’s work rate be 2x, B’s be y, and C’s be x. From the problem: 2x + y = 1/20 and y + x = 1/24. Solving these gives x = 1/120, y = 1/30. B’s rate is 1/30 per day. 40% of the work is 0.4. Time = 0.4 / (1/30) = 12 days.

hindi.explanation: माना A, B, C के कार्य दर क्रमशः 2x, y, x हैं। A + B की कार्य दर = 2x + y = 1/20 (एक दिन का कार्य)। B + C की कार्य दर = y + x = 1/24। दोनों समीकरणों को हल करने पर x = 1/120, y = 1/30। B अकेला पूरा कार्य 30 दिन में करता है। 40% कार्य के लिए समय = 30 × 0.4 = 12 दिन।

questions.original_question: Point P lies outside a circle with centre O. Tangents PA and PB are drawn to meet the circle at A and B respectively. If &ang;APB = 80&deg;, then &ang;OAB is equal to:

english.explanation: In quadrilateral OAPB, angles at A and B are 90° (tangent perpendicular to radius). Angle at P is 80°. Sum of angles in quadrilateral is 360°, so angle AOB = 100°. In triangle OAB, angles at A and B are equal: (180 - 100)/2 = 40°.

hindi.explanation: PA और PB स्पर्शरेखाएँ हैं, इसलिए ∠OAP = ∠OBP = 90°। चतुर्भुज OAPB में, ∠AOB = 100°। त्रिभुज OAB में, ∠OAB = (180° - 100°)/2 = 40°।

questions.original_question: Akhil takes 30 minutes extra to cover a distance of 150 km if he drives 10 km/h slower than his usual speed. How much time will be take to drive 90 km if he drives 15 km per hour slower than his usual speed?

english.explanation: Let original speed be v. Equation: 150/(v-10) - 150/v = 0.5. Solving gives v = 60 km/h. At 15 km/h slower (45 km/h), time for 90 km is 90/45 = 2 hours.

hindi.explanation: माना सामान्य गति = v किमी/घंटा। समीकरण: 150/(v-10) - 150/v = 0.5। हल करने पर v = 60 किमी/घंटा। 90 किमी की दूरी पर धीमी गति = 45 किमी/घंटा, समय = 90/45 = 2 घंटे।

questions.original_question: Chord AB of a circle of radius 10 cm is at a distance 8 cm from the centre O. If tangents drawn at A and B intersect at P., then the length of the tangent AP (in cm) is:

english.explanation: Chord AB is 12 cm (from radius 10 cm and distance 8 cm). Tangents from P form right triangles with OP. Using coordinates, P is (0, -12.5). Distance AP = sqrt(6² + (-4.5)²) = 7.5 cm.

hindi.explanation: जीवा AB की लंबाई = 12 सेमी (पाइथागोरस प्रमेय से)। स्पर्शरेखा AP की लंबाई = √(PO² - r²)। PO = 12.5 सेमी (ज्यामिति के अनुसार), इसलिए AP = 7.5 सेमी।

questions.original_question: The perimeter of a semi circle is 25.7 cm. What is its diameter (in cm)? (&pi; = 3.14)

english.explanation: Perimeter of a semicircle is πr + 2r. Given πr + 2r = 25.7. With π=3.14, r = 5 cm. Diameter = 2r = 10 cm.

hindi.explanation: अर्धवृत्त का परिमाप = πr + 2r = 25.7 सेमी। r = 5 सेमी, व्यास = 10 सेमी।

questions.original_question: Find the value of sin<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;30&deg; + cos<sup>4</sup>&nbsp;30&deg; - sin 25&deg; cos 65&deg; - sin 65&deg; cos25&deg;.
Find the ratio between the fourth proportional of 12, 16, 6 and the third proportional of 4, 6.

english.explanation: Fourth proportional of 12,16,6 is 8 (12/16 = 6/x → x=8). Third proportional of 4,6 is 9 (4/6 = 6/x → x=9). Ratio 8:9.

hindi.explanation: चतुर्थानुपाती = 8, तृतीयानुपाती = 9, अनुपात = 8:9।

questions.original_question: If the 8-digit number 888x53y4 is divisible by 72, then what is the value of (7x + 2y), for the maximum value of y?

english.explanation: Divisible by 8: Last three digits 3y4 must be divisible by 8. y=8. For divisibility by 9: Sum 36 +x +8 → x=1. 7x +2y =7*1 +2*8=23.

hindi.explanation: 72 से विभाज्यता के लिए अंतिम तीन अंक (3y4) 8 से विभाज्य होने चाहिए (y=8) और अंकों का योग 9 से विभाज्य होना चाहिए (x=1)। 7x + 2y = 7(1) + 2(8) = 23।

questions.original_question: &Delta; ABC &sim;&nbsp;&Delta; DEF. If the areas of&nbsp;&Delta; ABC and&nbsp;&Delta; DEF are 100 cm<sup>2</sup> and 81 cm<sup>2</sup> respectively and the altitude of&nbsp;&Delta; DEF is 6.3 cm, then the corresponding altitude of&nbsp;&Delta; ABC is:

english.explanation: Area ratio is 100:81 → side ratio 10:9. Altitude of ABC = (10/9)*6.3 = 7 cm.

questions.original_question: A trader sells an article at 16% below its cost price. Had he sold it for Rs. 192.20 more, he would have gained 15%. The cost price (in Rs.) of the article is:

english.explanation: Let CP = C. SP = 0.84C. For 15% gain: 0.84C +192.20 =1.15C. Solving gives C = 192.20 /0.31 =620.

questions.original_question: <strong>Directions: Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The word 'Hygeinic' is incorrectly spelled. The correct spelling is 'Hygienic' (with two 'g's and an 'i' after the 'e'). This follows the English rule 'i before e except after c'. 'Seasonal', 'Celestial', and 'Gymnastic' are all spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that will substitute the underlined part of the given sentence. In case no substitution is needed, select &lsquo;No substitution required&rsquo;.</strong></p>

<p>When I met the couple yesterday I noticed that the wife was <u>more taller</u> than her husband.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'more taller' is incorrect because 'taller' is already the comparative form of 'tall'. Adding 'more' to a comparative adjective is redundant. The correct phrase is simply 'taller'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Something that is to&nbsp;your&nbsp;advantage but happened&nbsp;by&nbsp;chance</p>

english.explanation: 'Fortuitous' means occurring by chance in a beneficial way. 'Occidental' refers to the West, 'Purposeful' and 'Deliberate' imply intentionality, which contradicts the idea of happening by chance. 'Fortuitous' matches the definition perfectly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in indirect speech.</strong></p>

<p>Sneha said to me, &ldquo;I was watching TV.&rdquo;</p>

options.value: Sneha told me that she was watching TV.
Sneha said to me that I was watching TV.
Sneha told me that she had been watching TV.
&nbsp;Sneha told me that I was watching TV.

english.correct_answer: 1. Sneha told me that she was watching TV.
english.explanation: In indirect speech, the past continuous tense 'was watching' is retained from the original direct speech. Options 2 and 4 incorrectly use 'I' or 'me' instead of 'she', and option 3 unnecessarily changes to past perfect ('had been watching').

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>A kick in the teeth</p>

english.explanation: 'A kick in the teeth' is an idiom meaning an unexpected disappointment or setback. Options 1, 3, and 4 are literal interpretations and do not align with the metaphorical meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in passive voice.</strong></p>

<p>Imran has found two good jobs in the advertisements of the newspaper.</p>

options.value: Two good jobs are being found by Imran in the advertisements of the newspaper.&nbsp;
Two good jobs had found by Imran in the advertisements of the newspaper.
Two good jobs have been found by Imran in the advertisements of the newspaper.
Two good jobs has found by Imran in the advertisements of the newspaper

english.correct_answer: 3. Two good jobs have been found by Imran in the advertisements of the newspaper.
english.explanation: The passive voice requires the present perfect tense 'have been found' to match the active voice 'has found'. Options 1 and 4 use incorrect verb forms, and option 2 is missing the auxiliary verb 'has'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>We don&#39;t really / want a large house; / we are looking for some comfort / and some convenience on a moderate price.&nbsp;</p>

options.value: and some convenience on a moderate price
we are looking for some comfort

english.correct_answer: 1. and some convenience on a moderate price
english.explanation: The phrase 'on a moderate price' is incorrect. The correct preposition should be 'at a moderate price'. The other parts of the sentence are grammatically correct.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Testify</p>

english.explanation: 'Affirm' is a direct synonym of 'Testify', both meaning to declare or confirm something. 'Oppose', 'Disprove', and 'Invalidate' are antonyms or unrelated.

The correct order is: C (ant falls into water) → A (dove helps with a leaf) → B (fowler tries to catch the dove) → D (ant is saved by the leaf). This sequence creates a coherent story of cause and effect.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Abolish</p>

english.explanation: 'Eliminate' is the direct synonym of 'Abolish', both meaning to do away with something. 'Establish', 'Continue', and 'Introduce' are opposites or unrelated.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Some people were tired of the long ______ in front of the mall and left without entering.</p>

english.explanation: 'Wait' fits the context of people waiting in line. 'Waist' (body part), 'weight', and 'waste' are unrelated to the context of a line or queue.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>The following sentence has been divided into parts. One of them contains an error. Select the part that contains the error from the given options.</strong></p>

<p>Lalitha will go / to sister&rsquo;s house / in Mumbai / this summer.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'to sister’s house' is grammatically incomplete. It should specify whose sister (e.g., 'to his sister’s house'). Without this, the sentence lacks clarity.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>A stumbling block</p>

english.explanation: 'A stumbling block' means an obstacle or difficulty. Options 1, 3, and 4 describe actions rather than the meaning of the idiom.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>Keats and Shelley were poets of the same period; they were ______.</p>

english.explanation: 'Contemporaries' means people living or occurring at the same time. 'Colleagues' and 'associates' imply professional collaboration, which is not stated in the question.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>To throw an event into confusion or disorder</p>

english.explanation: 'Disrupt' means to throw into disorder or confusion. 'Detonate', 'Erupt', and 'Explode' relate to sudden, forceful actions but do not exactly match the given definition.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that will improve the underlined part of the sentence. In case no improvement is needed, select &#39;No improvement&#39;.</strong></p>

<p>The teacher advised the children <u>to not went</u> near the lake.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence uses 'advise' followed by the infinitive. 'To not went' is grammatically incorrect because 'went' is the past tense. The correct form is 'not to go' (infinitive) to maintain the advice structure. 'Don’t go' is a contraction but changes the meaning to a direct command, while 'not to be going' is future continuous and inappropriate here.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Revel</p>

english.explanation: 'Revel' means to celebrate or rejoice. Its antonym should be a word meaning to grieve or feel sorrow. 'Mourn' directly opposes 'revel.' 'Appreciate,' 'rejoice,' and 'enjoy' are synonyms or related to positive emotions.

The logical flow starts with D (introduction about rivers in America). C introduces the Rio Grande as the most important river. A explains its importance due to location. B contrasts it with other rivers not used for shipping. This order (D→C→A→B) forms a coherent paragraph.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Downcast</p>

english.explanation: 'Downcast' means feeling or looking sad. Its antonym is 'Cheerful,' which means happy and upbeat. 'Disappointed,' 'distressed,' and 'successful' are unrelated in this context.

questions.original_question: <strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Scorpion.' 'Scorpeon' is a misspelling due to incorrect vowel order. Other options are correctly spelled.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.

english.explanation: The paragraph discusses the invention of the telephone. 'Originally' fits as the first step in a sequence of events, indicating the starting point of the invention process.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.

english.explanation: The sentence refers to Alexander Graham Bell creating the telephone. 'Designed' is the correct term for planning and creating an invention. 'Believed,' 'established,' and 'alleged' do not fit the context.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.

english.explanation: The phrase 'next to' is an idiom meaning 'close to' or 'adjacent to.' 'Near,' 'beside,' and 'along' are incorrect in this fixed expression.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.

english.explanation: The subject 'a machine' is singular, so the correct verb is 'was' (past tense). 'Are' and 'were' are plural, while 'be' is incorrect for past tense agreement.

questions.original_question: Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.

english.explanation: The sentence discusses the abilities or talents required to operate the machine. 'Skills' refers to learned abilities, fitting the context. 'Faculties' and 'gifts' are broader terms, while 'flair' implies natural talent, which is less precise.
